T1 scenario: objective=Establish performance baseline with centralized training on full C-MAPSS dataset, dataset_configuration=Full C-MAPSS (FD001, FD002, FD003, FD004); 80/10/10 train/val/test split, fl_configuration=N/A (Centralized), success_criteria=Accuracy ?0.92, RMSE ?15, Score ?1000; Establishes baseline, duration_estimate=4-6 hours

T10 scenario: objective=Evaluate fairness metrics across clients with heterogeneous data, dataset_configuration=T3 setup with detailed per-client performance tracking, fl_configuration=q-FedAvg (fairness-aware); q=0.1 for fairness objective, success_criteria=Statistical parity ?0.10; Equalized odds ?0.10; JFI ?0.80, duration_estimate=12-16 hours

T11 scenario: objective=Analyze model interpretability using SHAP/LIME for FL vs centralized, dataset_configuration=T1 and T2 with SHAP value computation for top 10 features, fl_configuration=FedAvg + SHAP computation on aggregated model, success_criteria=SHAP consistency ?0.75; Top-5 features match across centralized/federated, duration_estimate=8-12 hours

T12 scenario: objective=Validate complete framework with all requirements on realistic aviation scenario, dataset_configuration=T3 + T5 + T6 + T7 combined; Realistic 20-client aviation fleet scenario, fl_configuration=FedAvg + Multi-Krum + DP (?=5) + Compression + Fairness-aware aggregation, success_criteria=All metric thresholds met; System operates within aviation safety requirements, duration_estimate=24-36 hours

T2 scenario: objective=Evaluate FL performance with balanced IID data distribution across clients, dataset_configuration=10 clients, each with equal portion of C-MAPSS data; Random balanced split, fl_configuration=FedAvg; 10 clients; 100% participation; E=5 local epochs; lr=0.001, success_criteria=Accuracy ?0.90 (within 2% of baseline); Convergence ?50 rounds, duration_estimate=8-12 hours

T3 scenario: objective=Test FL performance with non-IID quantity skew (clients have different data amounts), dataset_configuration=10 clients with Dirichlet(?=0.5) distribution; Some clients have 10× more data, fl_configuration=FedAvg; 10 clients; 100% participation; E=5; lr=0.001, success_criteria=Accuracy ?0.88; Local variance ?0.15; Convergence ?70 rounds, duration_estimate=12-16 hours

T4 scenario: objective=Test FL performance with non-IID label skew (clients have different failure mode distributions), dataset_configuration=10 clients with failure mode partitioning; Each client has 1-2 failure modes dominant, fl_configuration=FedAvg; 10 clients; 100% participation; E=5; lr=0.001, success_criteria=Accuracy ?0.88; Local variance ?0.15; Convergence ?70 rounds, duration_estimate=12-16 hours

T5 scenario: objective=Measure communication overhead and efficiency of FL vs centralized, dataset_configuration=Same as T2 with communication logging, fl_configuration=FedAvg + gradient compression (Top-K sparsification, k=0.1), success_criteria=Communication cost ?50 MB/round; Efficiency ratio ?5×; Convergence time ?2 hours, duration_estimate=8-12 hours

T6 scenario: objective=Test robustness against Byzantine attacks (label-flipping, gradient manipulation), dataset_configuration=T2 setup + 20% malicious clients with label-flipping (10%) and gradient manipulation, fl_configuration=FedAvg + Multi-Krum aggregation (f=2 Byzantine clients), success_criteria=Attack detection ?0.85; Model accuracy degradation ?15% under attack, duration_estimate=10-14 hours

T7 scenario: objective=Evaluate privacy-utility trade-off with different ? values, dataset_configuration=T2 setup with DP-FedAvg; Test ? ? {1, 3, 5, 10}, fl_configuration=DP-FedAvg with Gaussian noise; Clipping threshold C=1.0; ?=10^-5, success_criteria=Accuracy ?0.85 for ??5; Privacy-utility trade-off validated, duration_estimate=12-16 hours

T8 scenario: objective=Test model convergence and performance with varying client dropout rates, dataset_configuration=T2 setup; Test dropout rates: {0%, 20%, 40%, 60%}, fl_configuration=FedAvg with asynchronous updates; Straggler threshold=2× median time, success_criteria=Model converges with ?70% dropout; Performance degradation ?10%, duration_estimate=10-14 hours

T9 scenario: objective=Monitor and detect concept drift, test adaptation strategies, dataset_configuration=Sequential training with FD001?FD002 transition to simulate operational condition change, fl_configuration=FedAvg with drift detection (KS test every 10 rounds); Retrain threshold p<0.01, success_criteria=Drift detected within 5 rounds of change; Adaptation recovers accuracy within 10 rounds, duration_estimate=16-20 hours
FL-PdM meets assurance objectives within intended ODD
